nodes.text: The criminal Verhandle had a group of soldiers that protected him. When Han Solo and Chewbacca refused to sell the Millennium Falcon to him, Verhandle dispatched a group of soldiers to stow away aboard the ship and steal it in transit. The squad hid under the Falcon's floor panels, and managed to get the drop on Solo in the cockpit. Although the squad contained at least six members, Chewbacca managed to ambush the group and incapacitate them.
